languages.text: "Туда, куда укажет твоя душа, {name}. Это — мой Путь, но он идет бок о бок с твоим — а значит, тебе выбирать, куда направить свои стремления и чаяния".
"It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."
languages.original_text: "Туда, куда укажет твоя душа, {name}. Это — мой Путь, но он идет бок о бок с твоим — а значит, тебе выбирать, куда направить свои стремления и чаяния".

traits.locale_text: "To where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it goes down side by side with yours — and that means that it is up to you where to direct your own aspirations and dreams."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it goes down side by side with yours — and that means that it is up to you where to direct your own aspirations and dreams."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “通往你的灵魂向往之处，{name}。这是我的道途，但它与你的道路齐头并进。也就是说，你可以选择你想去的任何地方，去实现你的愿望和梦想。”
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: “通往你的灵魂向往之处，{name}。这是我的道途，但它与你的道路齐头并进。也就是说，你可以选择你想去的任何地方，去实现你的愿望和梦想。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Adonde te guíe tu alma, {name}. Esta es mi senda, pero discurre paralelamente a la tuya; y eso significa que puedes decidir hacia dónde te encaminan tus propios sueños y aspiraciones».
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: «Adonde te guíe tu alma, {name}. Esta es mi senda, pero discurre paralelamente a la tuya; y eso significa que puedes decidir hacia dónde te encaminan tus propios sueños y aspiraciones».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Là où mène votre âme, {name}. Il s'agit de ma Voie, mais elle se déploie aux côtés de la vôtre. Cela signifie que vous pourrez choisir vers où vous mèneront vos aspirations et vos rêves. »
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: « Là où mène votre âme, {name}. Il s'agit de ma Voie, mais elle se déploie aux côtés de la vôtre. Cela signifie que vous pourrez choisir vers où vous mèneront vos aspirations et vos rêves. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wohin auch Eure Seele führt, {name}. Das ist mein Pfad, aber er verläuft direkt neben Eurem – und das heißt, Ihr werdet bestimmen, wohin Eure eigenen Wünsche und Träume führen."
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: "Wohin auch Eure Seele führt, {name}. Das ist mein Pfad, aber er verläuft direkt neben Eurem – und das heißt, Ihr werdet bestimmen, wohin Eure eigenen Wünsche und Träume führen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それはお前の魂が導く先へと続いている、{name}。これは我の道だが、お前の道と並走している。そしてそれは、お前が自身の願望と夢の舵をどこで切るかを選択するということを意味するのだ」
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: 「それはお前の魂が導く先へと続いている、{name}。これは我の道だが、お前の道と並走している。そしてそれは、お前が自身の願望と夢の舵をどこで切るかを選択するということを意味するのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, . This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

languages.text: "Ruhunun seni götürdüğü yere {name}. Bu benim Yolum, seninkiyle yan yana ilerliyor. Yani arzularını ve hayallerini istediğin yere yönlendirebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "It goes where your soul leads, {name}. This is my Path, but it runs side by side with yours — and that means that you will choose where to steer your own aspirations and dreams."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhunun seni götürdüğü yere {name}. Bu benim Yolum, seninkiyle yan yana ilerliyor. Yani arzularını ve hayallerini istediğin yere yönlendirebilirsin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
